property.name: cartId
property.label: Cart ID
property.description: Enter or choose the unique variable that represents your cart ID.

property.name: effectiveAccountId
property.label: Effective Account Id
property.description: The ID of the account under which the user is acting (BETA)

property.name: makeComponentReadOnly
property.label: Make Component Read Only
property.description: Specify whether delivery information from the Delivery component is read-only (!SGlobalConstant.True) or editable (!SGlobalConstant.False).

property.name: hideDeliveryInstructions
property.label: Hide Delivery Instructions
property.description: Specify whether users can provide additional shipping instructions during the checkout process (!SGlobalConstant.True) or not (!SGlobalConstant.False).

property.name: billingContactPointAddressId
property.label: Billing Contact Point Address Id
property.description: The address chosen from the Billing component to update.

property.name: hideCardExpirationMonth
property.label: Hide Card Expiration Month
property.description: Specify whether to show or hide the Card Expiration Month on the Payment component. Valid values are hide (!SGlobalConstant.True) or show (!SGlobalConstant.False).

property.name: hideCardHolderName
property.label: Hide Card Holder Name
property.description: Specify whether to show or hide the Cardholder Name on the Payment component. Valid values are show (!SGlobalConstant.True) and hide (!SGlobalConstant.False).

property.name: purchaseOrderNumber
property.label: Purchase Order Number
property.description: The Buyer's purchase order number.

property.name: paymentType
property.label: Selected Payment Type
property.description: Specify which payment type is selected eg. PurchaseOrderNumber, CardPayment.

property.name: shippingContactPointAddressId
property.label: Shipping Contact Point Address Id
property.description: The address chosen from the Shipping component to update.

property.name: shippingInstructions
property.label: Shipping Instructions Value
property.description: The shipping instructions entered in the Delivery component to update.

property.name: hidePurchaseOrderPaymentOption
property.label: Hide Purchase Order Payment Option
property.description: Hide this option on the payment screen

property.name: hideCreditCardPaymentOption
property.label: Hide Credit Card Payment Option
property.description: Hide this option on the payment screen

property.name: hideDeliveryMethodSelection
property.label: Hide Delivery Method Selection
property.description: Specify whether the user will select delivery methods during the checkout process (!SGlobalConstant.True) or not (!SGlobalConstant.False).

property.name: hideShippingAddressSelection
property.label: Hide Shipping Address Selection
property.description: Specify whether users can select pre-defined shipping addresses (!SGlobalConstant.True) or not (!SGlobalConstant.False).

property.name: hideShippingAddressManualEntry
property.label: Hide Shipping Address Manual Entry
property.description: Specify whether users can manually enter the shipping address (!SGlobalConstant.True) or not (!SGlobalConstant.False).

property.name: useDefaultDeliveryMethod
property.label: Use Default Delivery Method
property.description: Use the default delivery method defined in the custom metadata type (!SGlobalConstant.True) or not (!SGlobalConstant.False).

property.name: useDefaultTaxRate
property.label: Use Default Tax Rate
property.description: Use the default tax rate defined in the custom metadata type (!SGlobalConstant.True) or not (!SGlobalConstant.False).

property.name: hidePaymentMethodSection
property.label: Hide Payment Method Section
property.description: Hide the payment method section in checkout (no options will be visible)

property.name: hideShipToSection
property.label: Hide Ship To Section
property.description: Hide the ship to section in checkout (no options will be visible)

property.name: hideCartSummarySection
property.label: Hide Cart Summary Section
property.description: Hide the cart summary section in checkout (no options will be visible)

property.name: autoLaunchEditShipToAddressDialog
property.label: Automatically open the edit ship to address dialog
property.description: Automatically open the edit ship to address dialog. This only applies when manual address entry is enabled.
